name: Remi
description:
Roll your way through 1 exciting level in this action transforming marble demo! Move your mouse to turn the camera, use WASD to move and the arrow keys or mouse buttons to change form (some obstacles can only be passed with a certain material!)

This was a project for a school final I made with a couple others - at one point there was a more finished version with six levels but unfortunately it's been lost to the ages. This also had Xbox controls while in development, but I have not been able to test it- they might still be hiding in there somewhere!
